Roadmap.Title: Discover the Power of Electricity
Roadmap.Introduction: Welcome to your journey into the world of electricity! This roadmap will guide you through the basics of electricity, from understanding the fundamental concepts to applying them in real-world situations. Electricity is a fascinating subject that powers our modern world. Are you ready to discover its secrets? Let's get started!

Topics.Descriptions: Electricity is the flow of electric charge. In this topic, you'll learn about the basic concepts of electricity and different electrical components.
A circuit is a closed loop through which electric current can flow. In this topic, you'll learn about different types of circuits and Ohm's Law.

AdditionalInfo.Tips: Take notes and solve lots of problems to deepen your understanding of electricity.
AdditionalInfo.ProjectIdeas: Consider building a simple circuit or a small electronics project to apply your knowledge.
